Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Detroit in 2021...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/25/2021, off Thomas Winsor (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/11/2021, off Kenneth Cram (MON)...
Injured on 8/26/2022 with a Stiff Neck, out for 6 days...
Traded from Detroit to Boston on 3/2/2024 (Going to DET: SS John Hawkins. Going to BOS: P Nicholas Chidester, CF Bruce Beard)...
Won World Series with Boston in 2024...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $965,714 through salary arbitration...
